mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.query.DatabaseViewMissingException
mdException.label: DatabaseViewMissingException
mdException.message: The database view does not exist for this query. Make sure the query is saved and has columns selected.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.query.NoDBViewForDefaultQueryException
mdException.label: NoDBViewForDefaultQueryException
mdException.message: Please select a query before retrieving its database view name.
